BALLAST SPEED (In knots / about)
VARIABLE SPEED, CII DEPENDENT, ON DISTANCE AND PORT STAY WHICH NEEDS TO BE AGREED, HOWEVER ALTERNATIVE SPEED OF ABOUT 11.00 KTS AND CONSUMPTION OF ABOUT 20.00 MTONS WITH “HEAVY” HFO 380 CST + 0.1 MTONS LSMGO. IN CASE AGREED CII (BIMCO CII OPERATIONS CLAUSE) DETERIORATES DURING THE CP DUE VOYAGE CONDITIONS CHANGE, AND CHARTERERS FAIL TO INSTRUCT OR TAKE CORRECTIVE ACTIONS TO IMPROVE CII THROUGHOUT THE VOYAGE, MANAGERS HAVE THE RIGHT TO ADJUST SPEED ACCORDINGLY.
